description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A modern take on an ancient classic with sweet original music, friggin awesome backgrounds in space, and an extremely fun new mode that will put your reflexes to the test.  Grab a friend and crush'em mercilessly in super piniq turbo.
